product_name: Living ProofFull Dry Volume & Texture Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray is a versatile spray that adds volume + texture to any style for an imperfectly perfect lived-in look and feel.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers instant, revivable, and long-lasting volume and textureProvides buildable, no-slip grip for increased styling versatilityHeat protection up to 410¬∞ F/210¬∞ CLightly absorbs oil to extend the life of your lookInstantly transforms fine, flat, or thin hairWorks on dry hair so you can use it anytime, anywhereFor fine, flat or thin hair types or anyone who is looking for texture or volumeThe Lp. promise. Silicone-free. Paraben-free. Phthalate-free. Formaldehyde-free. Sulfate-free (No SLS & SLES). Cruelty-free. Vegan. Color-safe. Safe for chemically treated hair.Formerly known as Full Dry Volume BlastWhat's New: Updated valve for softer, more controlled delivery, enhanced texturizing capabilities, heat protection up to 410¬∞ F/210¬∞ CKey IngredientsVolumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Patented technology increases the space between individual hair fibers for long-lasting volume and texture that won‚Äôt weigh hair down.Blend of microporous minerals and enzymatically modified starches: Gives hair lived-in texture while lightly absorbing oil to extend the life of your look.Hydrophobic resins: Provides instant, buildable, soft hold that lasts‚Äîeven in high humidity.Item 2590400How To UseBEFORE EACH SPRAY, SHAKE CAN WELL. Hold can 6-10'' away from dry hair. Lift a section of hair and apply root to tip. Tousle hair with your fingers. Repeat until desired style is achieved, shake can between each spray. Spray on finished styles for extra texture and hold.Tip: Tip head sideways or upside down and spray product in small bursts throughout lengths for more texture.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, VA/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclodextrin, Zeolite, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylcellulose, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: BEFORE EACH SPRAY, SHAKE CAN WELL. Hold can 6-10'' away from dry hair. Lift a section of hair and apply root to tip. Tousle hair with your fingers. Repeat until desired style is achieved, shake can between each spray. Spray on finished styles for extra texture and hold.Tip: Tip head sideways or upside down and spray product in small bursts throughout lengths for more texture.

reviews.headline: Great texture spray.
reviews.comments: This is a great texture spray that does an amazing job with adding volume and texture to my hairstyles. Whether wearing my hair down and curled or back in a ponytail, it helps give more oomph to my hair and gives it the perfect finishing touch. Gifted by Livingproof.

reviews.headline: Living Proof is in the results
reviews.comments: This offers long-lasting, buildable texture and makes my hair volume appear improved. It doesn't leave behind white residue and the packaging makes it really easy to spray and use. This is a definite fave of mine gifted by Living Proof.

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: all living proof products are a no-brainer purchase for me and are very trustworthy and this product is no different. It adds a perfect amount of volume and texture to my hair and I love using it when my hair is too clean for a hairstyle. gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: The Volumizing & Texture Spray has quickly become my go-to. It adds the right amount of body and texture to my fine hair, giving it softness with a lightweight hold that makes styling effortless. The finish feels natural and long-lasting without stiffness. Gifted by livingproof.

reviews.headline: Volume
reviews.comments: The full dry volume and texture spray gifted by living proof is a great way to add texture to flat hair. It works great on thin hair that adds fullness and helps give volume. It doesn't make my hair feel sticky.

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this volumizing texture spray. My hair tends to get a little greasy and flat, so this is the perfect pick me up to have my hair looking a little bit fuller. Easy to apply and doesn't have a weird residue gifted by Living proof

reviews.headline: Heat protection included!
reviews.comments: This volume and texturizing spray is good at adding bounce to my hair. It's easy to use and has heat protection built in. However, I find that I need to wash my hair more frequently with use as there's a bit of residue. Gifted by living proof.

reviews.headline: A staple in my haircare routine
reviews.comments: This volumizing spray works beautifully for instant root boost and natural texture. My hair stays soft, never crunchy or oily, and it smells wonderful. Quick spritz, a little scrunch, and I'm good to go - such a great find! I received it complimentary from Livingproof and couldn't be happier!

reviews.headline: Great for slick Pin straight hair!!
reviews.comments: I was gifted this full dry volume & texture spray Complimentary from Living Proof in exchange for an honest review. I recently used this product to style my mother's hair. She has extremely straight, slick, and flat hair that never holds a curl or hairstyle. To my surprise, she was incredibly impressed with the results! The hold and volume she achieved in her braid from this product alone were simply amazing. I've never seen her hair hold that well with a hairstyle before. If you have slick pin straight hair, I highly recommend this product. I'm planning to try curling her hair next time. It's definitely worth the try!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This volume dry spray does a great job of making sure my heartless curls stay intact or even fluffing up a ponytail. Doesn't feel crunch or anything. Gifted to me by living proof and I definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Best texture spray I've tried
reviews.comments: Gifted by living proof. I have tried other brands texture sprays but they do not compare to living proof, but no surprise there. The loving proof texture spray helps hold the heatless curls and gives my waves that extra texture boost and sometimes they even last until the following day.

reviews.headline: Nice Hair Spray
reviews.comments: Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray is a nice product that provides volume to my flat straight hair giving it a lifted look. There is a hint of scent that fades away after applying. There is no mess and fuss using this product. Complimentary from Living Proof.

reviews.headline: I loved it
reviews.comments: My hair can be unruly and really take me forever to find a seamless and effortless style that allows it to cooperate and look amazing. This Texture spray instantly gives some volume and definition but also makes your hair feel and look healthier and fuller. Gifted by LivingProof

reviews.headline: Nice!
reviews.comments: Gifted by living proof This spray has a nice light weight feel to it that works well with my thinner hair type. When I use it with heat tools it makes my hair look fuller and gives more thickness to it. It also makes heat styling last longer

reviews.headline: Great for volume!
reviews.comments: I tried out the texture & volume spray by living proof and it's great! I love how it smells like getting your hair done at the hair salon. It comes in a big bottle too! I usually use it for a bit more volume in my hair when doing a blowout, love how it creates more volume and helps my flat hair. Complimentary from livingproof

reviews.headline: Easy to style
reviews.comments: This styling spray truly impressed me. I like using it before I step out, and the mist is light, spreading evenly through my hair. With just a blow dryer and my fingers, I can shape my style with ease. It leaves my hair appearing thicker, healthier, and with a soft, natural sheen. Gifted by Living Proof.

reviews.headline: Amazing for all hair
reviews.comments: I am impressed by this dry texture and volume shampoo. I've tried it on both my sisters fine straight hair and my own curly thicker hair and it works wonders on both of us. Gifted by living proof! Yay!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: If you have very fine hair you'll love this texture spray. It gives my hair great volume and hold without making it feel overly sticky or weighing it down. It adds some grit to my hair which makes styling so much easier. *kindly gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: Wasn't for me
reviews.comments: I honestly didn't love this. I like the way it smells and the volume it provides, but I didn't like the residue it left in my hair. It was pretty sticky feeling everytime I touched my hair. I think this would be nice if you like that beachy surf look, but not everyday wear in my opinion. Gifted by livingproof

reviews.headline: Decent volumizing spray
reviews.comments: I received this gifted by Living Proof and I like using it so far. It gives me a bit of a lift and helps keep my hair bouncy. I normally have pretty straight, flat hair and I noticed a difference when using this!

faceoff_positive.comments:
Disclaimer: I received this product, Livingproof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray, free of charge to try from PINCHme.

Great overall product, it's a multipurpose/multiuse type of spray and thats something that I can really stand behind. Gives you great volume, texture, and it soaks up excess oils in your hair, leaving you with hair that is touchably soft, but still with enough grit to it that it holds your desired style well, and without being at all crunchy feeling. Also the scent is amazing, it just smells so nice, I absolutely love it.

I have a growing out shaved head with a mohawk section that when left to fall to either side of my head reaches about at my chin length wise, and this product has been my go to since I received it to give my freshly washed hair the little bit of grit it needs to help it not just fall completely flat and limp, as well as to use when my hair hasn't been washed in a week and is in desperate need of some oils being soaked up before I can look presentable to be seen by other living beings, all while giving me effortless style, and a good amount of volume that makes me happy.

I'd absolutely recommend this to others, but personally I will be sad when my current bottle runs out because at the price point I'm not always able to afford to pick up a new can (the price point is literally the only downside to this product in my opinion.)
faceoff_positive.headline: Great overall product.. texture, volume, hold, no more oil..

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this product based on reviews that it received. I find nothing good about this product. Firstly, nozzle is very hard to push down and apply specially for an older woman like me with arthritic hands. After applying, hard is stiff and sticky and is in knots. Hard to brush hair and  hair falls out. I have bought 2 other products from this line, and have had no problems with it. Would never buy again and will return.
faceoff_negative.headline: Never Buy this product
